NORTH SEA.
SCOTLAND.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V POLARCUS NAILA TOWING EIGHT 6000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BETWEEN
   58-25N 58-00N AND 000-16W 002-00W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3186/13(25), VESSEL ASSISTED.
3. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3165/13.
